title: Vampieruz
description: In Russia 2050, sixteen year old Cecelia Rusakova is hunted. To remain untouched and undefiled she must live a life oblivious to the reality around her and is forced to leave behind her home and her friends, most painfully her boyfriend. She suffers the fate of her bloodline, whose story not many know, a story wrapped in the secrets of ancient Russia. Yet, she has no choice but to enrol in the Mortem Academy where she will soon realise that all those ancient stories about the supernatural were not just legends and the truth behind the deception.“I’m quite thirsty . . . my dear.”
author: Kia Scarlette
